title: A Festive Procession in Santiago de Compostela
description: A Festive Procession in Santiago de Compostela; Master of Edward IV (Flemish, active about 1470 - 1490); Bruges, Belgium; about 1480 - 1483; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 48 x 35 cm (18 7/8 x 13 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 7, fol. 122; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
